geometries

Class Tube

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometries.Geometry
      • geometries.RadialGeometry
        • geometries.Tube
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Intersectable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cylinder

    public class Tube
extends RadialGeometry
    Represents an infinite tube in the 3D space. That is, the cylinder does not have a length.
    Author:
    Osnat and Hodaya
